ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bow for bards!
ygData.msgSnippet: So where do the froggie foragers spawn? ... From: Sylly Songsynger [mailto:jgs@sba.uwm.edu] Sent: Friday, May 05, 2000 8:01 AM To: eqbards@egroups.com Subject:
ygData.messageBody:
So where do the froggie foragers spawn?

-----Original Message-----
From: Sylly Songsynger [mailto:jgs@...]
Sent: Friday, May 05, 2000 8:01 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Bow for bards!


Last night, we were hunting froogie foragers for the medalions so we can get
keys for Sebilis. Looks like the spectral bow is the forager's common (like
every time) drop. Another guild group let me loot one while I was waiting
for my guys. Thanks Lords of Edelo! Magic, lore, no drop. Skill: archery.
Atk Delay: 50. Damage: 19. Dex +3 Weight 8.5 Range 150. Class:War Rng Brd.
Race: All. Now to find some arrows all/all.

http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly/me/mybowstats.jpg

http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly/me/mybow.jpg

Enjoy,

Sylly




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

with the subject submissions.
